metadata.name: Colliders / 1
metadata.description:
Colliders is a 12 seconds duration Performance Art Short Film Series.
This collection was performed at the highest quality cinematography, using latest generation of video production tools.
Original choreography for the series was designed by Pola Rubis and Lamonte Goode and formulated into the 5 segments, that was artistically edited to create a 12 seconds shorts. Each piece is continuation of one another and can be fused into the 20 minutes movie.

Intricate shapes and forms - Unique Performance art of Neosutras is inspired by sacred geometry and yantric designs. Such elements are magnifying the power of connection between two opposites and symbolizing the process identical to colliders, that accelerating particles to very high kinetic energy and letting them impact other particles. 


Colliders used as a symbology of birth, innovation, generation of the new.
